product_name: Pepper's Gateway Polarized Sunglasses - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Pepper's Gateway Polarized Sunglasses reduce glare and block UV rays while adding a touch of style to your everyday look. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Shiny black frames feature polarized gray lenses. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Pepper's Gateway Polarized Sunglasses reduce glare and block UV rays while adding a touch of style to your everyday look.
